argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fidomndrng.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_fidomndrng | |- ( B e. Fin -> ( R e. Domn <-> R e. DivRing ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_anbi2d | |- ( B e. Fin -> ( ( R e. CRing /\ R e. Domn ) <-> ( R e. CRing /\ R e. DivRing ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_isidom | |- ( R e. IDomn <-> ( R e. CRing /\ R e. Domn ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_isfld | |- ( R e. Field <-> ( R e. DivRing /\ R e. CRing ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ancom | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ R e. CRing ) <-> ( R e. CRing /\ R e. DivRing ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_bitri | |- ( R e. Field <-> ( R e. CRing /\ R e. DivRing ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 4, 7 | #P_3bitr4g | |- ( B e. Fin -> ( R e. IDomn <-> R e. Field ) ) |
